titles.title: 404 Thou Magnet Of My Soul (familiar nice easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou Magnet of my soul
Let me come nearer till
The life of self pulsates
No more
But is forever still

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou Sunshine
Of my heart
Fill Thou each
Crevice there
And let Thy garden
Yield to Thee
A fragrance sweet
And rare

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou Ransomer
From death
Possess Thy
Ransomed one
Apporpriate to
Thine Own use
Thy spoil that
Thou hast won

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou Lord of Life
And Light
I bow beneath Thy sway
And count it holy privilege
Thy precepts to obey

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Thou Gift unspeakable
Straight from
God's heart of love
I break my heart
To give Thee room
And thus
Thy sweetness prove
